Think Like a Founder: Books for Big Business Moves

Whether you’re building from scratch or leading at scale, these business and finance books are designed for those ready to think bigger. Packed with real-world strategies, founder wisdom, and innovation-driven insights, this list will help you sharpen your decision-making, embrace risk, and take bold action—just like the entrepreneurs who’ve done it before you.

Making Money With AI Simplified

by JD Roby

Release Date: March 26, 2025

Discover how AI can take the guesswork out of investing, automate budgeting, and even identify new income opportunities. No complicated jargon, just straightforward techniques and the revolutionary WEALTH-AI system designed to help you make informed, confident financial decisions. Unlock the future of wealthbuilding starting today!

Buy on Amazon

Sketch Your Mind: Nurture a Playful and Creative Brain

by Zsolt Viczian

Release Date: June 15, 2025

What if your notes could do more than just sit there? What if they could spark creativity, reveal connections, and grow with you—without the chaos of scattered sketches or the drag of endless text? Sketch Your Mind isn’t just about drawing pretty pictures—it’s about building a visual-first system to capture, connect, and use your ideas like never before.

Buy on Amazon

Outclassed: How the Left Lost the Working Class and How to Win Them Back

by Joan C. Williams

Release Date: May 20, 2025

Is there a single change that could simultaneously protect democracy, spur progress on climate change, enact sane gun policies, and improve our response to the next pandemic? Yes: changing the class dynamics driving American politics.

Buy on Amazon

Bricks and Clicks: How We Drove Sonic Into the Digital Age

by Clifford Hudson & Craig Miller

Release Date: June 3, 2025

Bricks and Clicks offers a compelling narrative about how two industry veterans―Clifford Hudson and Craig Miller―transformed a nostalgic drive-in chain into a 21st-century powerhouse. The book provides deep insights into their leadership journey and the innovative strategies that have helped Sonic thrive during periods of uncertainty and ever-changing market conditions.

Buy on Amazon

Lean Learning: How to Achieve More by Learning Less

by Pat Flynn

Release Date: June 3, 2025

From an early age, we’re taught that more is better. More money, more information, more skills. But times have changed. What was once valuable has now become a burden, and if information alone were the answer, we’d all be exactly where we want.

Buy on Amazon

The Resilient Entrepreneur: Converting Adversity Into Wealth

by Marc Mason

Release Date: June 3, 2025

Marc Mason knows what it means to rise from the bottom. Born and raised in Massachusetts, he built his success brick by brick, overcoming adversity and transforming challenges into opportunities. As the founder of multiple businesses, Marc has experienced firsthand how grit, intentionality, and a relentless work ethic can lead to incredible success, regardless of where you start.
